name: Lonely Bullet
description:
💫✨ I'd do anything to find you! ✨💫

  Rhea, the miraculously impulsive space-ace, sets off on a dangerous journey through the universe's most fiesty galaxy in order to rescue the girl she loves. Unfortunately, some spikey- headed dork-brained prince has other ideas...

  Wow! That made him sound insidious! He's really just a moron, we promise! 

  Includes:

💫 Funny space sound effects

💫 A concerning amount of obstacles

💫 One mildly depressed isopod

💫 Gorls

  Please enjoy this charming, cute-girl bullet hell romance romp through space! 🌟

>>This is currently in development! Please comment with feedback! It's super appreciated!>>
